Text: Is this going to be out of sync like all the other episodes
No - all the other episodes have been fine. If you're having issues, try playing them with MPC-HC and/or VLC and if that doesn't work, re-download them.
Thanks very much,half way there.Excellent UL both quality and content.
Thanks very much,half way there.Excellent UL both quality and content.Out of sync?? cokeaddict--why complain when you get it for free.
All 5 eps run fine on vlc latest version its just when i play them through my western digital media player that they go out of sync. up to 20-30 sec out

Is this the last episode of the season?  I really enjoy this show thanks for all of your hard work.  I know how difficult it is to do this and the people who take time to do it never get enough credit.

So props from me bro.  Thanks again.
